casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Robert Walter HUFFMAN 328P06-3 Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 1, 2018 Daniel P. O'Brien, Special Deputy Attorney General, C. Ricky Bowman, District Attorney, for State of NC. Robert Walter Huffman, for Huffman, Robert Walter.

*877The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 20th of November 2017 by Defendant to Reconsider:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 1st of March 2018."
